metadata.name: Emulsion
metadata.description:
The concept for this piece is chaotic intermeshing of  two incompatible substances. In the culinary case of emulsion, this is usually of something water-based and an oil. 

This piece is inspired my both culinary experiments and microscopic explorations. The result is something that looks both yummy and fascinating: 

a microbial battle scene, or a kitchen mishap frozen in time.

Made with Stable Diffusion and photoshop.
